mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.label AS "label", a.title AS "title", a.from AS "from", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.to AS "to", a.context AS "context", a.read_flag AS "readFlag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_site( id, user_id, label, title, from, create_date, to, context, read_flag, del_flag, create_by, update_date, update_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{label}, #{title}, #{from}, #{createDate}, #{to}, #{context}, #{readFlag}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_site SET user_id = #{user.id}, label = #{label}, title = #{title}, from = #{from}, to = #{to}, context = #{context}, read_flag = #{readFlag}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
